downloadTitle: Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry lockdown and branding poster
downloadDescription: This poster provides information about the branding and lockdown features in Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry.
detailsSection: The branding and lockdown features in Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry can be used to ensure that the industry devices you create reflect your corporate identity and provide a targeted, secure, and consistent user experience.
systemRequirementsSection:
Additional Requirements:
This documentation is in the form of a Portable Document Format (.pdf) file. To view the .pdf file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader. Alternatively, you can download the Visio source file and modify as needed.
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click Download.
  2. If the File Download dialog box appears, do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer to view at a later time, click Save.        
  3. After the download is completed, right-click the Industry81_LockdownBrandingPoster.pdf file that has a compressed (.zip) file name extension, and then click Extract All to extract the files into a folder on your local computer.
  4. Double-click the Industry81_LockdownBrandingPoster.pdf file. If prompted, clear the Always ask before opening this file check box.
  5. If you still cannot view the file, right-click the Industry81_LockdownBrandingPoster.pdf file, click Properties, and then select the procedure that is most appropriate for you:
    • Clear the This file came from another computer and may be unsafe check box, and then click OK.
    • Click Unblock, and then click OK.        
  6. Double-click the Industry81_LockdownBrandingPoster.pdf file to view it.
